note.p: Obituaries: Biographical Memoirs of Fellows of the Royal Society 1976 vol 22 pp 635-653, plate, by J L Synge
References: T E Allibone, 'Philately and the Royal Society II' in NR 1999 vol 53 pp 107-119
W Hayes, 'Physics as well as poetry. Physicists of Ireland, edited by M McCartney and A Whitaker' in NR 2003 vol 57 pp 245-246
